title: Title
noStyleMessage: Select features with the same geometry to modify style.
startFinishDrawing: Click the map to start drawing. Double click to finish drawing.
startFinishDrawingBezier: Click the map to add a vertex. Click again to add a second vertex. Then, drag the midpoint or either end vertex to adjust the curve.
addText: Click the map to add text.
addStamp: Click the map to add stamp.
holdAndMove: Hold-click and move your mouse over the map to draw.
selectText: Click feature to select. Double-click to edit vertices of line or polygon features.
addRectangle: Click and drag to draw a rectangle. Hold Shift for square.
addCircle: Click and drag to draw a circle. Hold Shift for ellipse.
rectangleLassoSelect: Click and drag to select features.
ctrlShortcut: Hold while drawing to disable snapping.
tabShortcut: Set editing constraints while drawing (Tooltips must be enabled).

noRecentSymbols.point: You have no recent point symbols.
noRecentSymbols.line: You have no recent line symbols.
noRecentSymbols.curve: You have no recent curve symbols.
noRecentSymbols.polygon: You have no recent polygon symbols.
noRecentSymbols.text: You have no recent text symbols.

saveWarning: This map contains unsaved changes to sketch features. Save the sketch layer item to save sketch features with the item.
